files.name: main.py
files.content:
slurm = input("How many starting bottles?")
slurm = int(slurm)

if(slurm <= 0):
    print("You must enter 1 or more bottles.")
    print("")
    slurm = input("How many starting bottles?")
    slurm = int(slurm)
else:
    pass

for slurm in range(slurm, 0, -1):
    print(slurm, "bottles of Slurm on the wall.")
    print(slurm, "bottles of Slurm..")
    print("Take one down, pass it around..")
    print((slurm - 1), "bottles of Slurm on the wall.")
    print("")

print("No more bottles of Slurm on the wall!")
